price: 48. En als er tegen hen gezegd wordt: “Buig, dan Buigen zij niet neer."
arabic: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمُ ٱرۡكَعُواْ لَا يَرۡكَعُونَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: wa-idhā qīla lahumu ir'kaʿū lā yarkaʿūna
